channel.title: Movember on Martin Chorley
channel.description: Recent content in Movember on Martin Chorley

item.title: Beards, 'Taches and Testicles
item.description: This is me: mildly hungover morning selfie Obviously the first thing you notice, after my devilishly handsome good looks, is that I have around the lower half of my face what has the potential to be described as, if one is kind: a ‘beard’. It is patchy, it is more than often unkempt, and it is quite ginger, but it is somewhat beard like.
